creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
Vacations are postponed.
Meetings are postponed.
Many plans are postponed.
But, your life goals are not postponed. We are still here to help you to reach it.

While you stay at home, you don’t need to change your banking experience with Jenius. As a mobile-based app which is completed with Visa debit cards, Jenius will make a saving, transacting, and managing life/finance easier anytime and anywhere. We let you control your financial life with these features:

1. ACCOUNT ACTIVATION through a video call
No need to go to a bank. Now, opening a bank account can be done from anywhere.

2. Activate BUSINESS ACCOUNT without going to the bank
You can have 2 accounts (personal and business) in 1 Jenius app to manage business funds anywhere and anytime.

3. Debit card as a credit card
Instead of a credit card, now you can use Jenius Debit Cards to subscribe to Spotify, Netflix, make transactions in App Store/Google Play Store and create PayPal account.

4. SEND IT to pay all your bills
From money transfer, electricity, water, phone, credit card bills, to donation, every payment made easier and simpler with one feature.

5. Buy or sell 7 FOREIGN CURRENCIES
Besides IDR, you can also have USD, SGD, AUD, EUR, GBP, HKD, and JPY balance in your Jenius account. Connect any of those foreign currencies to your m-Card, and you’re ready to make a transaction.

6. e-WALLET CENTER to manage your e-Wallets
Manage up to 10 e-Wallet accounts of GO-PAY, OVO, DANA, LinkAja, and M-Tix, from one place. You can decide how much money you want to top up, starting from IDR10,001.

7. FLEXI SAVER, a flexible saving
Now you can have a flexible saving with 4% p.a. interest rate and with no minimum balance. You can top up and withdraw your fund anytime you want.

8. DREAM SAVER, your automatic saving
This automatic saving with 4% p.a. interest rate will help you achieve your dreams by making automatic debit payments to your savings every day/week/month.

9. MAXI SAVER to maximize your money
A term deposit with up to 5.75% p.a interest rate and minimum fund of IDR10,000,000. You can choose a preferred tenor and rollover method.

10. CARD CENTER to manage your debit cards
One place to manage all of your Jenius Debit Cards. From changing your card limit to requesting a new card, everything can be done right from the app.

11. $CASHTAG for money transfer
A personalized name as your account identity to send money and money request to another Jenius users.

12. SPLIT BILL to split your bills fairly
Going the Dutch way with your friends is now easier with Split Bill, even if they haven’t used Jenius.

13. PAY ME to send a money request with no worries
Sending a money request is now more convenient with $Cashtag, e-mail address or phone number. You can even send a reminder if you’re still not getting paid back.

14. JENIUS PAY for shopping online without a card
Input your $Cashtag and the bill will automatically be sent to your Jenius app. Easy-peasy!

15. FLEXI CASH for your emergency fund
Get ready for rainy days with an emergency fund up to IDR50,000,000. You can make multiple disbursements as you need.

16. IN & OUT, your transaction history
Jenius records your income and expenses with simple categorization based on your financial activities, so that you can track your spending easily.

17. Jenius E-STATEMENT is your bank statement
Don’t queue for statements! Save your time by downloading the monthly e-Statement from Jenius app and send it via e-mail/SMS/messaging apps if needed.

Jenius is part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Simpler Life, Happier You.
descriptionShort: The simple way to manage your life/finance with an app and Visa debit cards.

New to Jenius? Now you can input a referral code or your friend’s $Cashtag who recommended Jenius to you when register.

To use and make the most of all Jenius features, activate your account after register by using Video Call. It’s easy and free. You can even do it when you’re just #stayathome.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Two is better than one.

Kindly introduce our two latest features that will make your life easier: Jenius QR and Sinaya Prioritas.

Jenius QR allows you to pay using the QR code at all merchants that have QRIS (QR Code Indonesian Standard).

For selected customers, we bring our priority service into Jenius app through Sinaya Prioritas. Enjoy free domestic and overseas ATM withdrawal, and a dedicated Relationship Manager.

Go update your Jenius app!

A term deposit with up to 5.5% p.a interest rate and minimum fund of IDR10,000,000. You can choose a preferred tenor and rollover method.

9. Buy or sell 7 FOREIGN CURRENCIES
Besides IDR, you can also have USD, SGD, AUD, EUR, GBP, HKD and JPY balance in your Jenius account. Connect any of those foreign currencies to your m-Card and you’re ready to make a transaction and investment.

10. SEND IT to pay all your bills
We offer easy access to money transfer, pay electricity, water, phone, credit card bills, donation, and every payment with one feature.

11. e-WALLET CENTER to manage your e-Wallets
Manage up to 10 digital wallet accounts of GO-PAY, OVO, DANA, LinkAja! and M-Tix, from one place. You can decide how much money you want to top up, starting from IDR10,001.

12. JENIUS PAY for shopping online without a card
Input your $Cashtag and the bill will automatically be sent to your Jenius app.

13. CARD CENTER to manage your debit cards
One place to manage all of your Jenius Debit Cards. From changing your card limit to requesting a new card.

14. $CASHTAG for money transfer
A personalized name as your account identity to send money and money request to another Jenius users.

15. SPLIT BILL to split your bills fairly
Going the Dutch way with your friends is now easier with Split Bill, even if they haven’t used Jenius.

16. PAY ME to send a money request with no worries
Sending a money request is now more convenient with $Cashtag, e-mail address or phone number.

17. FLEXI CASH for your emergency fund
Get ready for rainy days with an emergency fund up to IDR50,000,000. You can make multiple disbursements as you need.

18. IN & OUT, your transaction history
Jenius records your income and expenses with simple categorization based on your financial activities.

19. Jenius E-STATEMENT is your bank statement
Don’t queue for cash flow statements! Save your time by downloading the monthly e-Statement from Jenius app and send it via e-mail/SMS/messaging apps if needed.

Jenius is part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Besides IDR, you can also have USD, SGD, AUD, EUR, GBP, HKD and JPY balance in your Jenius account. Connect any of those foreign currencies to your m-Card and you’re ready to make a transaction and investment.

10. SEND IT to pay all your bills
We offer easy access to money transfer, pay electricity, water, phone, credit card bills, donation, and every payment with one feature.

11. e-WALLET CENTER to manage your e-Wallets
Manage up to 10 digital wallet accounts of GO-PAY, OVO, DANA, LinkAja! and M-Tix, from one place. You can decide how much money you want to top up, starting from IDR10,001.

12. JENIUS PAY for shopping online without a card
Input your $Cashtag and the bill will automatically be sent to your Jenius app.

13. CARD CENTER to manage your debit cards
One place to manage all of your Jenius Debit Cards. From changing your card limit to requesting a new card.

14. $CASHTAG for money transfer
A personalized name as your account identity to send money and money request to another Jenius users.

15. SPLIT BILL to split your bills fairly
Going the Dutch way with your friends is now easier with Split Bill, even if they haven’t used Jenius.

16. PAY ME to send a money request with no worries
Sending a money request is now more convenient with $Cashtag, e-mail address or phone number.

17. FLEXI CASH for your emergency fund
Get ready for rainy days with an emergency fund up to IDR50,000,000. You can make multiple disbursements as you need.

18. IN & OUT, your transaction history
Jenius records your income and expenses with simple categorization based on your financial activities.

19. Jenius E-STATEMENT is your bank statement
Don’t queue for cash flow statements! Save your time by downloading the monthly e-Statement from Jenius app and send it via e-mail/SMS/messaging apps if needed.

Jenius is part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

We built banking experience based on your needs and aspirations to make transacting and managing life/finance easier anytime and anywhere

1. Activate PERSONAL and BUSINESS ACCOUNT without going to the bank
You can have 2 bank accounts (personal and business) in 1 Jenius app to manage your funds anywhere and anytime.

2. ACCOUNT ACTIVATION through a video call
No need to go to a bank. Now, opening a bank account can be done everywhere, even when you stay at home!

3. JENIUS PAY for shopping online without a card
Input your $Cashtag and the bill will automatically be sent to your Jenius app.

4. No more juggling between multiple apps, pay with QRIS
It is a quick and secure new contactless payment method from Jenius.

5. Moneytory to map out your personal cash flow
This is the perfect money tracker to help you manage financial life effectively.

6. FLEXI SAVER, a flexible saving
Saving account is on your smartphone. Now you can have up to 3 flexible savings with 3% p.a. interest rate and with no minimum balance. You can top up and withdraw your fund anytime.

7. DREAM SAVER, your automatic saving
This automatic saving with 3% p.a. interest rate will help you achieve your dreams by making automatic debit payments to your saving every day/week/month.

8. MAXI SAVER to maximize your money
A term deposit with up to 5% p.a interest rate and minimum fund of IDR10,000,000. You can choose a preferred tenor and rollover method.

9. e-WALLET CENTER to manage your e-Wallets
Manage up to 10 digital wallet accounts of GO-PAY, OVO, DANA, LinkAja! M-Tix, and BNI TapCash from one place. You can decide how much money you want to top up, starting from IDR10,001.

10. Buy or sell 7 FOREIGN CURRENCIES
Besides IDR, you can also have USD, SGD, AUD, EUR, GBP, HKD and JPY balance in your Jenius account. Connect any of those foreign currencies to your m-Card and you’re ready to make a transaction and investment.

11. SEND IT to pay all your bills
We offer easy access to money transfer, pay electricity, water, phone, credit card bills, donation, and every payment with one feature.

12. CARD CENTER to manage your debit cards
One place to manage all of your Jenius Debit Cards. From changing your card limit to requesting a new card.

13. $CASHTAG for money transfer
A personalized name as your account identity to send money and money request to another Jenius users.

14. SPLIT BILL to split your bills fairly
Going the Dutch way with your friends is now easier with Split Bill, even if they haven’t used Jenius.

15. PAY ME to send a money request with no worries
Sending a money request is now more convenient with $Cashtag, e-mail address or phone number.

16. FLEXI CASH for your emergency fund
Get ready for rainy days with an emergency fund up to IDR50,000,000. You can make multiple disbursements as you need.

17. IN & OUT, your transaction history
Jenius records your income and expenses with simple categorization based on your financial activities.

18. Jenius E-STATEMENT is your bank statement
Don’t queue for cash flow statements! Save your time by downloading the monthly e-Statement from Jenius app and send it via e-mail/SMS/messaging apps if needed.

Jenius is part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
“Why Feesible?”

We want to continue to provide innovations that make your life easier. This commitment has never changed since Jenius was born 5 years ago.

Subscription fee of IDR10,000/month may be unpleasant news for you. However, with this we can continue our commitment.

For you who are new to Jenius, thank you for choosing us. As a warm welcome, enjoy 3 months free subscription to experience the benefits of Jenius in your life.

Happy new year

descriptionHtml:

As a mobile-based and simple app that is completed with Visa debit cards, Jenius will help you find your own way to manage life/finance easier anytime and anywhere.

We built banking experience and these features based on your needs and aspirations:

1. Activate BUSINESS ACCOUNT without going to the bank
You can have 2 bank accounts (personal and business) in 1 Jenius app to manage your business finance anywhere and anytime.

2. ACCOUNT ACTIVATION through a video call
No need to go to a bank. Now, opening a bank account can be done everywhere.

3. Jenius DEBIT CARD for all transactions worldwide
You can use m-Card, e-Card (virtual debit card), and x-Card (additional debit card) to manage your expenses.

4. JENIUS PAY for shopping online without a card
Input your $Cashtag and the bill will automatically be sent to your Jenius app.

5. No more juggling between multiple apps, pay with QRIS
It is a simple, quick, and secure new contactless payment method from Jenius. Just scan the QR Code to pay.

6. Moneytory to map out your personal cash flow
This is the perfect money tracker to help you manage spending effectively.

7. FLEXI SAVER, a flexible saving
The savings account is on your smartphone. Now you can have up to 3 flexible savings with 3% p.a. interest rate and with no minimum balance. You can top up and withdraw your fund anytime.

8. DREAM SAVER, your automatic saving
This automatic saving with 3% p.a. interest rate will help you achieve your dreams by making up to 5 automatic debit payments to your savings every day/week/month.

9. MAXI SAVER to maximize your money
A term deposit with up to 4.5% p.a interest rate and minimum fund of IDR10,000,000. You can choose a preferred tenor and rollover method.

10. e-WALLET CENTER to manage your e-Wallets
Manage up to 10 e wallet accounts of GO-PAY, OVO, DANA, LinkAja! M-Tix, and BNI TapCash from one place. You can decide how much money you want to top up for your e Wallet, starting from IDR10,001.

11. Buy or sell 7 FOREIGN CURRENCIES
Besides IDR, you can also have USD, SGD, AUD, EUR, GBP, HKD and JPY balance in your Jenius account. Connect any of those foreign currencies to your m-Card and you’re ready to make a transaction, investment and trading forex from your mBanking.

12. SEND IT to pay all your bills
We offer easy access to money transfer, pay electricity, water, phone, credit card bills, donation, and every payment with one feature.

13. CARD CENTER to manage your debit cards
One place to manage all of your Jenius Debit Cards. From changing your card limit to requesting a new card.

14. $CASHTAG for money transfer
A personalized name as your account identity to send money and money requests to other Jenius users.

15. SPLIT BILL to split your bills fairly
Going the Dutch way with your friends is now easier with Split Bill, even if they haven’t used Jenius.

16. PAY ME to send a money request with no worries
Sending a money request is now more convenient with $Cashtag, e-mail address or phone number.

17. FLEXI CASH for your emergency fund
Get ready for rainy days with an emergency fund up to IDR50,000,000. You can make multiple disbursements as you need.

18. IN & OUT, your transaction history
Jenius records your income and expenses with simple categorization based on your financial activities.

19. Jenius E-STATEMENT is your bank statement
Don’t queue for cash flow statements! Save your time by downloading the monthly e-Statement from Jenius app and send it via e-mail/SMS/messaging apps if needed.

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

As a mobile-based and simple app that is completed with Visa debit cards, Jenius will help you find your own way to manage life/finance easier anytime and anywhere.

We built banking experience and these features based on your needs and aspirations:

1. Activate BUSINESS ACCOUNT without going to the bank
You can have 2 bank accounts (personal and business) in 1 Jenius app to manage your business finance anywhere and anytime.

2. ACCOUNT ACTIVATION through a video call
No need to go to a bank. Now, opening a bank account can be done everywhere.

3. Jenius DEBIT CARD for all transactions worldwide
You can use m-Card, e-Card (virtual debit card), and x-Card (additional debit card) to manage your expenses.

4. JENIUS PAY for shopping online without a card
Input your $Cashtag and the bill will automatically be sent to your Jenius app.

5. No more juggling between multiple apps, pay with QRIS
It is a simple, quick, and secure new contactless payment method from Jenius. Just scan the QR Code to pay.

6. Moneytory to map out your personal cash flow
This is the perfect money tracker to help you manage spending effectively.

7. FLEXI SAVER, a flexible saving
The savings account is on your smartphone. Now you can have up to 3 flexible savings with 3% p.a. interest rate and with no minimum balance. You can top up and withdraw your fund anytime.

8. DREAM SAVER, your automatic saving
This automatic saving with 3% p.a. interest rate will help you achieve your dreams by making up to 5 automatic debit payments to your savings every day/week/month.

9. MAXI SAVER to maximize your money
A term deposit with up to 4.5% p.a interest rate and minimum fund of IDR10,000,000. You can choose a preferred tenor and rollover method.

10. e-WALLET CENTER to manage your e-Wallets
Manage up to 10 e wallet accounts of GO-PAY, OVO, DANA, LinkAja! M-Tix, and BNI TapCash from one place. You can decide how much money you want to top up for your e Wallet, starting from IDR10,001.

11. Buy or sell 7 FOREIGN CURRENCIES
Besides IDR, you can also have USD, SGD, AUD, EUR, GBP, HKD and JPY balance in your Jenius account. Connect any of those foreign currencies to your m-Card and you’re ready to make a transaction, investment and trading forex from your mBanking.

12. SEND IT to pay all your bills
We offer easy access to money transfer, pay electricity, water, phone, credit card bills, donation, and every payment with one feature.

13. CARD CENTER to manage your debit cards
One place to manage all of your Jenius Debit Cards. From changing your card limit to requesting a new card.

14. $CASHTAG for money transfer
A personalized name as your account identity to send money and money requests to other Jenius users.

15. SPLIT BILL to split your bills fairly
Going the Dutch way with your friends is now easier with Split Bill, even if they haven’t used Jenius.

16. PAY ME to send a money request with no worries
Sending a money request is now more convenient with $Cashtag, e-mail address or phone number.

17. FLEXI CASH for your emergency fund
Get ready for rainy days with an emergency fund up to IDR50,000,000. You can make multiple disbursements as you need.

18. IN & OUT, your transaction history
Jenius records your income and expenses with simple categorization based on your financial activities.

19. Jenius E-STATEMENT is your bank statement
Don’t queue for cash flow statements! Save your time by downloading the monthly e-Statement from Jenius app and send it via e-mail/SMS/messaging apps if needed.

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Simpler Life, Happier You
descriptionShort: The simple way to manage your life/finance with an app and Visa debit cards.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Dive into 2021 with a new level.

2021 is already on the way and now you have the chance to elevate your way in Jenius. On this update you can upgrade your level in the Jenius app to be Sinaya Prioritas if you have a minimum total balance of IDR 500,000,000.

Upgrade now for free to enjoy many exclusive bonuses and privileges.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Managing online subscriptions made easy!

In this latest version, Jenius helps you track your online subscriptions. We’ll send you a reminder a day before the billing date.

Merchant’s name, billing amount, and which cards you use to pay the subscriptions –we’ve got you covered! Make sure you turn on the notifications.

Also, you can check all upcoming subscription payments via In & Out - Upcoming.

Go update your Jenius app!

This is the perfect money tracker to help you manage spending effectively.

7. FLEXI SAVER, a flexible saving
The savings account is on your smartphone. Now you can have up to 3 flexible savings with 3% p.a. interest rate and with no minimum balance. You can top up and withdraw your fund anytime.

8. DREAM SAVER, your automatic saving
This automatic saving with 3% p.a. interest rate will help you achieve your dreams by making up to 5 automatic debit payments to your savings every day/week/month.

9. MAXI SAVER to maximize your money
A term deposit with up to 4.5% p.a interest rate and minimum fund of IDR10,000,000. You can choose a preferred tenor and rollover method.

10. e-WALLET CENTER to manage your e-Wallets
Manage up to 10 e wallet accounts of GO-PAY, OVO, DANA, LinkAja! M-Tix, and BNI TapCash from one place. You can decide how much money you want to top up for your e Wallet, starting from IDR10,001.

11. Buy or sell 7 FOREIGN CURRENCIES
Besides IDR, you can also have USD, SGD, AUD, EUR, GBP, HKD and JPY balance in your Jenius account. Connect any of those foreign currencies to your m-Card and you’re ready to make a transaction, investment and trading forex from your mBanking.

12. SEND IT to pay all your bills
We offer easy access to money transfer, pay electricity, water, phone, credit card bills, donation, and every payment with one feature.

13. CARD CENTER to manage your debit cards
One place to manage all of your Jenius Debit Cards. From changing your card limit to requesting a new card.

14. $CASHTAG for money transfer
A personalized name as your account identity to send money and money requests to other Jenius users.

15. SPLIT BILL to split your bills fairly
Going the Dutch way with your friends is now easier with Split Bill, even if they haven’t used Jenius.

16. PAY ME to send a money request with no worries
Sending a money request is now more convenient with $Cashtag, e-mail address or phone number.

17. FLEXI CASH for your emergency fund
Get ready for rainy days with an emergency fund up to IDR50,000,000. You can make multiple disbursements as you need.

18. IN & OUT, your transaction history
Jenius records your income and expenses with simple categorization based on your financial activities.

19. Jenius E-STATEMENT is your bank statement
Don’t queue for cash flow statements! Save your time by downloading the monthly e-Statement from Jenius app and send it via e-mail/SMS/messaging apps if needed.

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Now, you can pay Zakat Al-Fitr via Jenius. Go to Send It, choose Bills, and click Zakat & Others. Choose Baznas then pick Zakat Al-Fitr.

Go update your Jenius app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Your Jenius Debit Card is about to expire? Replace your card ONLY via Jenius app!

Please note, we don’t offer card replacement via other media.

Just go to Card Center, choose the debit card you want to replace, and confirm your address. A new card will be sent to your address straightaway!

Once the new card arrives, don’t forget to activate it. You can still use your old card until the validity date.

Card replacement is free of charge, so what are you waiting for? Update now!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
How are you, teman Jenius? Hope you are well.

Many things have happened in the past year and we want to know.

Don’t worry, not all of it. Only if there are any updates on your work or income details.

In this version, we ask you to update your personal details. It helps us to keep your account secure and prevent any potential fraud.

Stay safe and healthy!

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
SURPRISE!!!
 
Jenius has a new look to celebrate its fifth anniversary!
 
Jenius application now comes with a simple interface, so that more than 3,000,000 Jenius users can get more personalized banking services to manage their finances and lives in their own way.
 
For account activation, you can still do it anywhere, via video calls.
 
What's new in the Jenius app?
1. Screen bottom navigation
Simpler access to various Jenius features through one button and four new pages that will make it easier for you.
 
2. Mobius button
One Mobius button in the middle of the bottom navigation of the screen to help you access 6 features faster:
- Move Balance
- SEND IT
- Scan QRIS
- E-WALLET CENTER
- Pay Bills
- Collect Money
 
3. Home
The first page you see after logging in, contains the latest information about your financial activities including Active Balance information (Rupiah and foreign currencies), shortcut buttons for transactions, and financial report insights.
 
4. Wealth
Managing all your money is now easier and more practical on the Wealth page which is divided into three main menus:
- Cash
- Investment (coming soon)
- Credit, contains FLEXI CASH, a standby fund for you.
 
Some of the features that you can access from the Cash menu:
- SAVE IT helps you to open savings/deposits via
FLEXI SAVER : 3 flexible savings to allocate money based on your needs
DREAM SAVER : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
MAXI SAVER : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone
 
5. Cards
You can manage your Jenius Debit Card more easily from the Cards page.
From setting balances and shopping limits, blocking/unblocking cards, creating new cards, everything is possible! Jenius Debit Cards (m-Card, e-Card, and x-Card) can be used throughout the Visa network.
 
6. Profile
Profile page makes it easy for you to access and view personal information such as account numbers and $Cashtags. You can also switch to a Jenius BUSINESS ACCOUNT more easily, just click and hold the Profile button at the bottom of the screen to switch accounts conveniently.
 
Your favorite features such as SPLIT BILL, PAY ME, MONEYTORY, IN & OUT, E-STATEMENT, JENIUS PAY, and JENIUS QR can now be accessed more easily.
 
You can also still pay electricity bills, buy credit, pay for internet and buy/sell 7 foreign currencies on the Jenius app.
 
Besides the new look, there is another surprise from Jenius. It is “Berani Lebih Hemat” offer that gives discount up to Rp500.000 for those of you who want to invest, shop online, and use telemedicine services with Jenius.
 
Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.
 
Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.
 
Simpler Life, Happier You

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Jenius always wants to grow with you. So on this 5th anniversary, we come with a revamped look that can simplify your financial activities.

Say hi to the bottom screen navigation!
Your transactions and financial activities are now easier via a quick action button and four new pages: Home, Wealth, Cards, and Profile.

Enjoy a new and simple personal experience with Jenius!

Do it easily, #LakukanDenganCaramu

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
SURPRISE!!!
 
Jenius has a new look to celebrate its fifth anniversary!
 
Jenius application now comes with a simple interface, so that more than 3,000,000 Jenius users can get more personalized banking services to manage their finances and lives in their own way.
 
For account activation, you can still do it anywhere, via video calls.
 
What's new in the Jenius app?
1. Screen bottom navigation
Simpler access to various Jenius features through one button and four new pages that will make it easier for you.
 
2. Mobius button
One Mobius button in the middle of the bottom navigation of the screen to help you access 6 features faster:
- Move Balance
- SEND IT
- Scan QRIS
- E-WALLET CENTER
- Pay Bills
- Collect Money
 
3. Home
The first page you see after logging in, contains the latest information about your financial activities including Active Balance information (Rupiah and foreign currencies), shortcut buttons for transactions, and financial report insights.
 
4. Wealth
Managing all your money is now easier and more practical on the Wealth page which is divided into three main menus:
- Cash
- Investment (coming soon)
- Credit, contains FLEXI CASH, a standby fund for you.
 
Some of the features that you can access from the Cash menu:
- SAVE IT helps you to open savings/deposits via
FLEXI SAVER : 3 flexible savings to allocate money based on your needs
DREAM SAVER : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
MAXI SAVER : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone
 
5. Cards
You can manage your Jenius Debit Card more easily from the Cards page.
From setting balances and shopping limits, blocking/unblocking cards, creating new cards, everything is possible! Jenius Debit Cards (m-Card, e-Card, and x-Card) can be used throughout the Visa network.
 
6. Profile
Profile page makes it easy for you to access and view personal information such as account numbers and $Cashtags. You can also switch to a Jenius BUSINESS ACCOUNT more easily, just click and hold the Profile button at the bottom of the screen to switch accounts conveniently.
 
Your favorite features such as SPLIT BILL, PAY ME, MONEYTORY, IN & OUT, E-STATEMENT, JENIUS PAY, and JENIUS QR can now be accessed more easily.
 
You can also still pay electricity bills, buy credit, pay for internet and buy/sell 7 foreign currencies on the Jenius app.
 
Besides the new look, there is another surprise from Jenius. It is “Berani Lebih Hemat” offer that gives discount up to Rp500.000 for those of you who want to invest, shop online, and use telemedicine services with Jenius.
 
Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.
 
Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.
 
Simpler Life, Happier You

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
SURPRISE!!!
 
Jenius has a new look to celebrate its fifth anniversary!
 
Jenius application now comes with a simple interface, so that more than 3,000,000 Jenius users can get more personalized banking services to manage their finances and lives in their own way.
 
For account activation, you can still do it anywhere, via video calls.
 
What's new in the Jenius app?
1. Screen bottom navigation
Simpler access to various Jenius features through one button and four new pages that will make it easier for you.
 
2. Mobius button
One Mobius button in the middle of the bottom navigation of the screen to help you access 6 features faster:
- Move Balance
- SEND IT
- Scan QRIS
- E-WALLET CENTER
- Pay Bills
- Collect Money
 
3. Home
The first page you see after logging in, contains the latest information about your financial activities including Active Balance information (Rupiah and foreign currencies), shortcut buttons for transactions, and financial report insights.
 
4. Wealth
Managing all your money is now easier and more practical on the Wealth page which is divided into three main menus:
- Cash
- Investment (coming soon)
- Credit, contains FLEXI CASH, a standby fund for you.
 
Some of the features that you can access from the Cash menu:
- SAVE IT helps you to open savings/deposits via
FLEXI SAVER : 3 flexible savings to allocate money based on your needs
DREAM SAVER : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
MAXI SAVER : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone
 
5. Cards
You can manage your Jenius Debit Card more easily from the Cards page.
From setting balances and shopping limits, blocking/unblocking cards, creating new cards, everything is possible! Jenius Debit Cards (m-Card, e-Card, and x-Card) can be used throughout the Visa network.
 
6. Profile
Profile page makes it easy for you to access and view personal information such as account numbers and $Cashtags. You can also switch to a Jenius BUSINESS ACCOUNT more easily, just click and hold the Profile button at the bottom of the screen to switch accounts conveniently.
 
Your favorite features such as SPLIT BILL, PAY ME, MONEYTORY, IN & OUT, E-STATEMENT, JENIUS PAY, and JENIUS QR can now be accessed more easily.
 
You can also still pay electricity bills, buy credit, pay for internet and buy/sell 7 foreign currencies on the Jenius app.
 
Besides the new look, there is another surprise from Jenius. It is “Berani Lebih Hemat” offer that gives discount up to Rp500.000 for those of you who want to invest, shop online, and use telemedicine services with Jenius.
 
Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.
 
Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.
 
Simpler Life, Happier You

Profile page makes it easy for you to access and view personal information such as account numbers and $Cashtags. You can also switch to a Jenius BUSINESS ACCOUNT more easily, just click and hold the Profile button at the bottom of the screen to switch accounts conveniently.
 
Your favorite features such as SPLIT BILL, PAY ME, MONEYTORY, IN & OUT, E-STATEMENT, JENIUS PAY, and JENIUS QR can now be accessed more easily.
 
You can also still pay electricity bills, buy credit, pay for internet and buy/sell 7 foreign currencies on the Jenius app.
 
Besides the new look, there is another surprise from Jenius. It is “Berani Lebih Hemat” offer that gives discount up to Rp500.000 for those of you who want to invest, shop online, and use telemedicine services with Jenius.
 
Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.
 
Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

descriptionHtml:
SURPRISE!!!
 
Jenius has a new look to celebrate its fifth anniversary!
 
Jenius application now comes with a simple interface, so that more than 3,000,000 Jenius users can get more personalized banking services to manage their finances and lives in their own way.
 
For account activation, you can still do it anywhere, via video calls.
 
What's new in the Jenius app?
1. Screen bottom navigation
Simpler access to various Jenius features through one button and four new pages that will make it easier for you.
 
2. Mobius button
One Mobius button in the middle of the bottom navigation of the screen to help you access 6 features faster:
- Move Balance
- SEND IT
- Scan QRIS
- E-WALLET CENTER
- Pay Bills
- Collect Money
 
3. Home
The first page you see after logging in, contains the latest information about your financial activities including Active Balance information (Rupiah and foreign currencies), shortcut buttons for transactions, and financial report insights.
 
4. Wealth
Managing all your money is now easier and more practical on the Wealth page which is divided into three main menus:
- Cash
- Investment (coming soon)
- Credit, contains FLEXI CASH, a standby fund for you.
 
Some of the features that you can access from the Cash menu:
- SAVE IT helps you to open savings/deposits via
FLEXI SAVER : 3 flexible savings to allocate money based on your needs
DREAM SAVER : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
MAXI SAVER : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone
 
5. Cards
You can manage your Jenius Debit Card more easily from the Cards page.
From setting balances and shopping limits, blocking/unblocking cards, creating new cards, everything is possible! Jenius Debit Cards (m-Card, e-Card, and x-Card) can be used throughout the Visa network.
 
6. Profile
Profile page makes it easy for you to access and view personal information such as account numbers and $Cashtags. You can also switch to a Jenius BUSINESS ACCOUNT more easily, just click and hold the Profile button at the bottom of the screen to switch accounts conveniently.
 
Your favorite features such as SPLIT BILL, PAY ME, MONEYTORY, IN & OUT, E-STATEMENT, JENIUS PAY, and JENIUS QR can now be accessed more easily.
 
You can also still pay electricity bills, buy credit, pay for internet and buy/sell 7 foreign currencies on the Jenius app.
 
Besides the new look, there is another surprise from Jenius. It is “Berani Lebih Hemat” offer that gives discount up to Rp500.000 for those of you who want to invest, shop online, and use telemedicine services with Jenius.
 
Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.
 
Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Finally, you can invest in mutual funds in Jenius!

Investing in mutual funds in Jenius is quite simple. As simple as filling in your last education info to open an account, check risk profile, and get a reference on portfolio composition. You can also buy and sell directly from/to your Active Balance.

To start, open your Jenius App, select Wealth on the bottom screen navigation, then select the Investment menu.

Start investing to grow your wealth with Jenius!

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
Have a better financial life is your new year’s resolution?

Good news! Because now, Jenius has new menu, Investment, that makes buying and selling reksa dana more easier.

On the other hand, Jenius continues to innovate so that more than 3.000.000 users can get more personalized banking services to manage their finances and lives more easily.

Curious about Jenius?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account from anywhere, via video call.

After activation, you will get Jenius Debit Card that you can use at various Visa merchant across the world. You can also use this debit card to pay bill for movie and music streaming services, games, payments on App Store/Google Play and more. What's new in the Jenius app?

For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay : Online shopping uses $Cashtag
- Jenius QR : Scan QRIS to pay
- Send It : Transfer to various account and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
Transactions using Jenius are more cost-effective because there are many promos every day.

Simpler saving based on your needs using this feature:
- Flexi Saver : 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Dream Saver : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Maxi Saver : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone

You can also exchange 7 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD, EUR) at Jenius app and activate them on your m-Card for transactions.

Other features that you can use, include:
- e-Wallet Center : An easy way to top up up to 10 e-wallet (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)
- Pay Me : Send a money request from smartphone
- Split Bill : Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash : Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Moneytory : Get insight for your financial report

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is registered and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Curious about Jenius?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account from anywhere, via video call.

After activation, you will get Jenius Debit Card that you can use at various Visa merchant across the world. You can also use this debit card to pay bill for movie and music streaming services, games, payments on App Store/Google Play and more. What's new in the Jenius app?

For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay : Online shopping uses $Cashtag
- Jenius QR : Scan QRIS to pay
- Send It : Transfer to various account and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
Transactions using Jenius are more cost-effective because there are many promos every day.

Simpler saving based on your needs using this feature:
- Flexi Saver : 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Dream Saver : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Maxi Saver : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone

You can also exchange 7 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD, EUR) at Jenius app and activate them on your m-Card for transactions.

Other features that you can use, include:
- e-Wallet Center : An easy way to top up up to 10 e-wallet (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Pay Bills feature got revamped!

Paying bills got easier with access via Home or Mobius button. Top up mobile credit, pay electricity, zakat, or credit cards—you can pay it all!

Want quick access to your favorite bills? Just activate the save bill button when paying, then find your bills in Saved for the next payment.

Moreover, you can also enjoy the new PIN display on this version.

Curious to see those nicely revamped displays? Let's update!

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
More than 3,000,000 users have started taking #langkahkecilhariini to build a better financial lives with Jenius.

Now you can access all of your financial needs in one place without switching between applications.

Do you want to start your #langkahkecilhariini?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account from anywhere, via video call.

After activation, you will get Jenius Debit Card that you can use at various Visa merchant across the world. You can also use this debit card to pay bill for movie and music streaming services, games, pay/buy apps and more.

If you have a plan to travel around the world, you can exchange 7 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD,EUR) at Jenius app and activate them on your m-Card for transactions.

For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay : Online shopping uses $Cashtag
- Jenius QR : Scan QRIS to pay
- Send It : Transfer to various account and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
Transactions using Jenius are more cost-effective because there are many promos every day.

Simpler saving based on your needs using this feature:
- Flexi Saver : 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Dream Saver : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Maxi Saver : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone

Other features that you can use, include:
- e-Wallet Center : An easy way to top up up to 10 e-wallet (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)
- Pay Me : Send a money request from smartphone
- Split Bill : Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash : Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Moneytory : Get insight for your financial report

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is authorized and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Pay Bills feature got revamped!

Paying bills got easier with access via Home or Mobius button. Top up mobile credit, pay electricity, zakat, or credit cards—you can pay it all!

Want quick access to your favorite bills? Just activate the save bill button when paying, then find your bills in Saved for the next payment.

Moreover, you can also enjoy the new PIN display on this version.

Curious to see those nicely revamped displays? Let's update!

Updates for You on Home got two new categories: Try Now and Highlights.

Try Now is where you’ll find our latest features or enhancements.

Highlights provides you with the latest info on promos, collabs, and Jenius campaigns.

Go check them out by updating your Jenius app.

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
More than 3,000,000 users have started taking #langkahkecilhariini to build a better financial lives with Jenius.

Now you can access all of your financial needs in one place without switching between applications.

Do you want to start your #langkahkecilhariini?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account from anywhere, via video call.

After activation, you will get Jenius Debit Card that you can use at various Visa merchant across the world. You can also use this debit card to pay bill for movie and music streaming services, games, pay/buy apps and more.

If you have a plan to travel around the world, you can exchange 7 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD,EUR) at Jenius app and activate them on your m-Card for transactions.

For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay : Online shopping uses $Cashtag
- Jenius QR : Scan QRIS to pay
- Send It : Transfer to various account and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
Transactions using Jenius are more cost-effective because there are many promos every day.

Simpler saving based on your needs using this feature:
- Flexi Saver : 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Dream Saver : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Maxi Saver : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone

Other features that you can use, include:
- e-Wallet Center : An easy way to top up up to 10 e-wallet (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)
- Pay Me : Send a money request from smartphone
- Split Bill : Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash : Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Moneytory : Get insight for your financial report

Just by paying Feesible (subscription fee) only Rp10.000 per month, you can experience a simplicity in financial management with Jenius.

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is licensed and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Simpler Life, Happier You

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now you can send Foreign Currency using Jenius!

The process is just as simple as using Send It like you usually do. You can also send Foreign Currency to other Jenius users, it's free of charge and real-time!

So now you can buy, sell, send, and receive foreign currencies in one app. Simple right?

One more good news for you. We just launched Jenius Credit Card. You can apply, activate, and manage this card digitally.

What are you waiting for? Go, update!

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
More than 3,000,000 users have started taking #langkahkecilhariini to build a better financial lives with Jenius.

Now you can access all of your financial needs in one place without switching between applications.

Do you want to start your #langkahkecilhariini?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account from anywhere, via video call.

Now, Jenius Credit Card is available and you can apply, activate, and manage it through an application.

You also can get Jenius Debit Card that you can use at various Visa merchant across the world. You can also use this debit card to pay bill for movie and music streaming services, games, pay/buy apps and more.

If you have a plan to travel around the world, you can exchange 7 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD,EUR) at Jenius app and activate them on your m-Card for transactions.

For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay : Online shopping uses $Cashtag
- Jenius QR : Scan QRIS to pay
- Send It : Transfer to various account and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
Transactions using Jenius are more cost-effective because there are many promos every day.

Simpler saving based on your needs using this feature:
- Flexi Saver : 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Dream Saver : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Maxi Saver : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone

Other features that you can use, include:
- e-Wallet Center : An easy way to top up up to 10 e-wallet (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)
- Pay Me : Send a money request from smartphone
- Split Bill : Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash : Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Moneytory : Get insight for your financial report


Just by paying Feesible (subscription fee) only Rp10.000 per month, you can experience a simplicity in financial management with Jenius.

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is licensed and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Simpler Life, Happier You

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
More than 3,000,000 users have started taking #langkahkecilhariini to build a better financial lives with Jenius.

Now you can access all of your financial needs in one place without switching between applications.

Do you want to start your #langkahkecilhariini?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account from anywhere, via video call.

Now, Jenius Credit Card is available and you can apply, activate, and manage it through an application.

You also can get Jenius Debit Card that you can use at various Visa merchant across the world. You can also use this debit card to pay bill for movie and music streaming services, games, pay/buy apps and more.

If you have a plan to travel around the world, you can exchange 7 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD,EUR) at Jenius app and activate them on your m-Card for transactions.

For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay : Online shopping uses $Cashtag
- Jenius QR : Scan QRIS to pay
- Send It : Transfer to various account and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
Transactions using Jenius are more cost-effective because there are many promos every day.

Simpler saving based on your needs using this feature:
- Flexi Saver : 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Dream Saver : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Maxi Saver : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone

Other features that you can use, include:
- e-Wallet Center : An easy way to top up up to 10 e-wallet (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)
- Pay Me : Send a money request from smartphone
- Split Bill : Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash : Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Moneytory : Get insight for your financial report


Just by paying Feesible (subscription fee) only Rp10.000 per month, you can experience a simplicity in financial management with Jenius.

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is licensed and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Simpler Life, Happier You

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
More than 3,000,000 users have started taking #langkahkecilhariini to build a better financial lives with Jenius.

Now you can access all of your financial needs in one place without switching between applications.

Do you want to start your #langkahkecilhariini?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account from anywhere, via video call.

Now, Jenius Credit Card is available and you can apply, activate, and manage it through an application.

You also can get Jenius Debit Card that you can use at various Visa merchant across the world. You can also use this debit card to pay bill for movie and music streaming services, games, pay/buy apps and more.

If you have a plan to travel around the world, you can exchange 7 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD,EUR) at Jenius app and activate them on your m-Card for transactions.

For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay : Online shopping uses $Cashtag
- Jenius QR : Scan QRIS to pay
- Send It : Transfer to various account and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
Transactions using Jenius are more cost-effective because there are many promos every day.

Simpler saving based on your needs using this feature:
- Flexi Saver : 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Dream Saver : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Maxi Saver : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone

Other features that you can use, include:
- e-Wallet Center : An easy way to top up up to 10 e-wallet (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)
- Pay Me : Send a money request from smartphone
- Split Bill : Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash : Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Moneytory : Get insight for your financial report


Just by paying Feesible (subscription fee) only Rp10.000 per month, you can experience a simplicity in financial management with Jenius.

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is licensed and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Simpler Life, Happier You

Get ready to level up your banking experience! We've got exciting news for you!

Introducing two fantastic new features for an effortless transaction:

Shortcut Scan QRIS
Now available on the PIN page. Quicker access to scan and go! Convenience at its best, right?

Jenius QR
We've upgraded payment methods in Jenius QR. Choose between "Pay Now" using Active Balance or "Pay Later" with Jenius Paylater.

Excited to dive in? Update your Jenius app now. Or turn on auto-update to stay in the loop!

More than 3,000,000 users have started taking #langkahkecilhariini to build a better financial lives with Jenius.

Now you can access all of your financial needs in one place without switching between applications.

Do you want to start your #langkahkecilhariini?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account from anywhere, via video call.

Now, Jenius Credit Card is available and you can apply, activate, and manage it through an application.

You also can get Jenius Debit Card that you can use at various Visa merchant across the world. You can also use this debit card to pay bill for movie and music streaming services, games, pay/buy apps and more.

If you have a plan to travel around the world, you can exchange 7 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD,EUR) at Jenius app and activate them on your m-Card for transactions.

For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay : Online shopping uses $Cashtag
- Jenius QR : Scan QRIS to pay
- Send It : Transfer to various account and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
Transactions using Jenius are more cost-effective because there are many promos every day.

Simpler saving based on your needs using this feature:
- Flexi Saver : 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Dream Saver : 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Maxi Saver : Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone

Other features that you can use, include:
- e-Wallet Center : An easy way to top up up to 10 e-wallet (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)
- Pay Me : Send a money request from smartphone
- Split Bill : Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash : Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Moneytory : Get insight for your financial report


Just by paying Feesible (subscription fee) only Rp10.000 per month, you can experience a simplicity in financial management with Jenius.

Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is licensed and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and guaranteed by LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.

Simpler Life, Happier You

PT Bank BTPN Tbk
Menara BTPN – CBD Mega Kuningan
Jl. Dr. Ide Anak Agung Gde Agung Kav 5.5-5.6
Jakarta 12950

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Big news alert!

Say hello to Thailand Baht (THB) and Chinese Yuan (CNY) in our currency lineup! Buying, selling, and sending them is now a breeze on Jenius app.

How to get started? On the Home page, tap the + sign above Active Balance. Buy at least 100 THB or 100 CNY, and you’re all set!

Time to take your foreign currency game to the next level. Get the update now!

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
More than 4,000,000 users have started to build a better financial life with Jenius.

Now you can access all of your financial needs, from transactions, savings, lending, investment to financial reports in one place without switching between applications.


Ready to start simplifying your life finance?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account with Face Recognition in no time.


With m-Card (Jenius main debit card) and 3 additional debit cards, you can make transactions at various Visa merchants across the world. In addition to that, you will also have an e-Card for movies and music streaming services, games, pay/buy apps and more.

Interested in awesome rewards? With fully online application, management, and point redemption, Jenius Credit Card has a lot of generous offers for easier point collection. You can redeem points into travel miles, points, even e-Wallet balance in real time.

If you have plans to travel around the world, 9 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD, EUR, THB, CNY) are available at Jenius app. You can link them to your m-Card for transactions.


For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay: Pay for your online shopping with just your $Cashtag
- Jenius QR: Scan QRIS for quick and easy payment option
- Send It: Transfer to various accounts and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
With lots of promos every day, not only that transactions using Jenius are practical and easy, but they are also cost-effective.


Want to save some funds? There are saving options for you to use based on your needs:
- Dream Saver: 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Flexi Saver: 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Flexi Rasa Maxi: Locked savings for some cashback, gold, and goods upfront
- Maxi Saver: Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone


Other features that you can use, including:
- e-Wallet Center: An easy way to top up up to 10 e-Wallet and e-Money (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, mandiri e-money, ShopeePay, and M-Tix)
- Pay Me: Send money requests from your smartphone
- Split Bill: Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash: Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Investment: Grow your wealth through mutual fund
- Jenius Paylater: New source-of-fund for small transactions
- Moneytory: Get insight for your financial report

Just by paying Feesible (subscription fee) for only Rp10.000 per month, you can experience the simplicity of financial management with Jenius.


Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is licensed and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and is a member of LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.



Simpler Life, Happier You

creator: BTPN
descriptionHtml:
The simple way to manage your life/finance with an app and Visa debit and credit cards.
More than 4,000,000 users have started to build a better financial life with Jenius.

Now you can access all of your financial needs, from transactions, savings, lending, investment to financial reports in one place without switching between applications.


Ready to start simplifying your life finance?
Download Jenius application, register and activate your account with Face Recognition in no time.


With m-Card (Jenius main debit card) and 3 additional debit cards, you can make transactions at various Visa merchants across the world. In addition to that, you will also have an e-Card for movies and music streaming services, games, pay/buy apps and more.
For easier financial activities, Jenius Awards grant you up to 25x free cash withdrawal at Bersama/Prima ATMs and unlimited intrabank transfer, both according to your level and refreshed monthly.

Interested in awesome rewards? With fully online application, management, and point redemption, Jenius Credit Card has a lot of generous offers for easier point collection. You can redeem points into travel miles, points, even e-Wallet balance in real time.
If you have plans to travel around the world, 9 foreign currencies (USD, SGD, JPY, GBP, AUD, HKD, EUR, THB, CNY) are available at Jenius app. You can link them to your m-Card for transactions.


For online transactions, you can use:
- Jenius Pay: Pay for your online shopping with just your $Cashtag
- Jenius QR: Scan QRIS for quick and easy payment option
- Send It: Transfer to various accounts and pay bills (internet, credit card, top up balance, electricity, zakat, and others)
With lots of promos every day, not only that transactions using Jenius are practical and easy, but they are also cost-effective.


Want to save some funds? There are saving options for you to use based on your needs:
- Dream Saver: 5 savings to help you make dreams come true
- Flexi Saver: 3 flexible savings to allocate money
- Flexi Rasa Maxi: Locked savings for some cashback, gold, and goods upfront
- Maxi Saver: Open as many deposits as you want from your smartphone



Other features that you can use, including:
- e-Wallet Center: An easy way to top up up to 10 e-Wallet and e-Money (GoPay, OVO, LinkAja, DANA, BNI TapCash, mandiri e-money, and ShopeePay)
- Pay Me: Send money requests from your smartphone
- Split Bill: Easily split the bill
- Flexi Cash: Cash out your flexible fund for various needs
- Investment: Grow your wealth through mutual fund
- Jenius Paylater: New source-of-fund for small transactions
- Moneytory: Get insight for your financial report

Just by paying Feesible (subscription fee) for only Rp10.000 per month, you can experience the simplicity of financial management with Jenius.


Jenius is a digital banking and part of PT Bank BTPN Tbk. that is licensed and supervised by OJK (Indonesia Financial Services Authority) and is a member of LPS (Indonesia Deposit Insurance Corporation), so Jenius is safe.

Find out more about this new way of banking at www.jenius.com and start a new, better life with Jenius.


#ThinkUnthinkable
